mapper.select: select p.id,t_id,view_name,`add`,del,upd,sel,RealName as s_name from power as p left join teacher as t on p.t_id=t.ID where p.company =#{c}
select p.id,t_id,view_name,[add],del,upd,sel,RealName as s_name from power as p left join teacher as t on p.t_id=t.ID where p.company =#{c}
